main.name: Ivana Dokic
main.description: currently employed by LIC Youth Soccer Academy, one of the best youth soccer programs in New York City
main.bio: I am Software Developer with a background in telecommunications and computer science. I am a life-long learner and over the course of my career have continually expanded my knowledge, most recently becoming proficient in building and developing applications using Javascript, React, Ruby on Rails and SQL, among other languages and platforms.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to reach out to me!

work.title: Director
work.description: Develop and update website. Maintain, update and create new web content using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. Integrations to external services and softwares setup. Develop an online advertising campaigns to promote sponsors, partners and fundraising collaborations.

work.title: Senior specialist for data services
work.description: Define, develop, manage, and drive execution of the T-Mobile's roadmap for fixed and mobile broadband solutions. Project Manager in software/hardware and telecommunication network technologies with a focus on technical product management and/or product development. Managed P&L for up to 10M in gross revenue. Participate in technical design and architecture with cross functional teams â€“ network architects and engineers for successful development and implementation of the requirements. Increased revenue by 5M through the successful implementation of retail project.

testimonials.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
